definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: appar. incline (perh. akin to [[תּוּר]] Thes; > Buhl denom. from [[תּׂאַר]], q. v.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ת]]:, subj. boundary: Jos 18:14, c. [[ה]] loc. 15:9 b. 11; c. [[עַל]]…[[מִן]]: v:Jos 18:9 a; c. [[מִן]] only, Jos 18:17; prob. also c. acc. loc. Jos 19:13 (read [[רִמּ֫וֹנׇה וְתָאַר הַנֵּעָה]] to Rimmon, and it inclined to Ne‘a Di Steuern Benn al.). Vid. also [[[תָּאַר]]]
